ComicInfo.Summary: A new maxi-series from the fertile mind of Warren Ellis! There are 1001 people on the Global Frequency, connected together across a worldwide telecommunications spider web from Nova Scotia to Tasmania. You'll never know when you get the call, but when you do you have 30 minutes to save the world. Global Frequency, the last, best line of defense that you have never heard of. And if you're lucky, you never will.
ComicInfo.Title: Bombhead
